abstract: Boeing’s loss of the contract to a rival team was a blow not just to its corporate pride but its long-range outlook.
snippet: Boeing’s loss of the contract to a rival team was a blow not just to its corporate pride but its long-range outlook.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  The Boeing Company said Monday that it would seek to overturn the award to rival manufacturers of a multibillion-dollar contract to build aerial refueling aircraft.

headline.main: Boeing to Appeal Air Force Tanker Contract
headline.print_headline: Boeing to Appeal Air Force Tanker Contract

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co

abstract: Boeing must decide by Wednesday whether to file an appeal on the Pentagon’s contract with Airbus.
snippet: Boeing must decide by Wednesday whether to file an appeal on the Pentagon’s contract with Airbus.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  Just hours before the Air Force announced the winner of a $35 billion contract to build aerial refueling aircraft on Feb. 29, an Airbus plane lumbered off the runway in Getafe, Spain, and climbed to 27,000 feet to rendezvous with a Portuguese F-16 fighter.

headline.main: In Tanker Bid, It Was Boeing vs. Bold Ideas
headline.print_headline: It Was Boeing Vs. Bold Ideas In Tanker Bid

byline.original: By DAVID HERSZENHORN and JEFF BAILEY
